answers.text: yeah i remember that the lecturer said there would be some at 4 but it doesn't seem to have been announced yet..
the consultation is 1-2pm on fridays. there will be an extra one at 4pm today.

posts.question: i went to the consultation room today but no-one was there. are consultations not running this friday thanks

answers.text: it wasnt on today sorry for the confusion. i will be doing a consult now 2pm in 403 if it is needed. in future weeks it will be 1pm
if i come right now will you still be here thanks

answers.text: consultation time on friday is now 1-2.

answers.text: yes consultations are on today at 2 00 in 403.
